name: Nexus Defense
description:
Your spaceship has crashed on a foreign planet, and your only way to escape is to drain enough energy to repair it. So, defend your nexus before the monsters that inhabit the planet destroy it!

- Place your turrets strategically in order to kill the monsters

- Use your skills to make their lives more difficult

- Build up mortal compositions from +15 different turrets

- Discover the best combinations

Demo available now!

                                                                                                       

CONTROLS

- 1/2/3 for building turrets

- QWERT for using actives

- A/D for rotating camera

- F for finalizing the planning phase

- Space/left-click for building

- Right-click for canceling building/actives
